content: {"name": "Lutheran Church of the Reformation - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* The food pantry is closed on the first two Mondays of April 2023.\n* It is closed on all Federal holidays plus Easter Monday, the Friday after Thanksgiving, and December 26th-31st. ", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "212 East Capitol Street Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Capitol Hill", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20003", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.89006570000001, "longitude": -77.0028518}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 543-4200", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
